adrFormatAddress: 150 E 39th St, New York, NY 10016, USA

editorialSummary.text: Showroom for modern & classic office furniture & storage items, as well as design/planning services.

originalText.text: My law firm used D2's services to assist us in selecting, purchasing, delivering and assembling office furniture following an expansion.  Howard and his team provided top notch service.  Everything was delivered as promised and on time.  The quality of the furniture he sells is excellent and he has many long standing vendors who are very good about communicating with staff for the sake of planning delivery and installation.  Highly recommended.

originalText.text: I worked with Matthew at D2 to help furnish our new office space. He was incredibly helpful in guiding me on the type of furniture that would provide the most durability, best aesthetic design, and stay within our budget. Everything we ordered came in time and looks amazing! I would definitely recommend D2 to others looking to furnish their office space.

text.text: I worked with Matthew at D2 to help furnish our new office space. He was incredibly helpful in guiding me on the type of furniture that would provide the most durability, best aesthetic design, and stay within our budget. Everything we ordered came in time and looks amazing! I would definitely recommend D2 to others looking to furnish their office space.

originalText.text: I came to D2 for an office chair. New to NYC, of course I started with several of the large office supply stores. But their selection was poor and assistance minimal. So I found D2 online. I stopped by and was shown to their large showroom by Matt, one of their employees. The selection reflected a knowledge of office furniture and great design! I found a chair I liked and they ordered one to be delivered to my new office. But that wasn't the best part. The best part was that the chair I got wasn't a right fit. I reached out to Matt and his team did everything to rectify the situation -- including having me come back to the showroom to try out different chairs. They were clearly committed to my comfort and satisfaction. Eventually I swapped out my chair for another one and I couldn't be happy with the product and the service I received from D2. I'm grateful for all their help!

originalText.text:
We highly recommend D2 Office Furniture + Design for their outstanding service and quality. The furniture is beautiful & we are a very happy client. Absolutely wonderful customer service.

Thank you Matthew & D2 Team!

originalText.text: D2 is a family friendly company and the essential example of professionalism. One of their key strengths is identifying and anticipating their client's needs and matching them with the perfect solution. D2 is a firm that prides itself on hard work, which emerges to the forefront in their consistent, excellent results.
